title: How to Redeem Mystery Skin
body: When i logged in today, i got a popup saying I was eligible for a mystery skin from riot. Where do you redeem it? I can't seem to find the tab.

replies.body: Did you read the pop up? It tells you that you have received the skin and which one you got. You claimed it by logging in.
After scrolling through my champs, got a Reindeer Kog'maw skin.....now have 3 for kog :'(

Ahhh Thanks, couldn't remember what I got I closed the client afterwards >_>
Edit: Any way of checking what skin you got without scrolling through like 50+ champs
